title: Recommended jungler anyone?
body: Any junglers that u think are overpowered and I should play?{{sticker:sg-zephyr}}

replies.body:
Try out every champion that can successfully clear the jungle at constant pace while applying pressuring around the map, and can solo secure objectives 

Here is a list of champions you should look into
{{champion:266}} {{champion:32}} {{champion:164}} {{champion:31}} {{champion:131}} {{champion:36}} {{champion:245}} {{champion:60}} {{champion:28}} {{champion:9}} {{champion:105}} {{champion:86}} {{champion:79}} {{champion:427}} {{champion:59}} {{champion:24}} {{champion:126}} {{champion:145}} {{champion:429}} {{champion:30}} {{champion:10}} {{champion:141}} {{champion:121}} {{champion:203}} {{champion:240}} {{champion:64}} {{champion:117}} {{champion:54}} {{champion:57}} {{champion:11}} {{champion:75}} {{champion:111}} {{champion:76}} {{champion:56}} {{champion:20}}{{champion:2}} {{champion:516}}  {{champion:78}} {{champion:80}} {{champion:555}} {{champion:421}} {{champion:33}} {{champion:58}} {{champion:107}} {{champion:92}} {{champion:68}} {{champion:113}} {{champion:35}} {{champion:98}} {{champion:102}} {{champion:72}} {{champion:517}} {{champion:223}} {{champion:163}} {{champion:44}} {{champion:91}} {{champion:48}} {{champion:23}} {{champion:29}} {{champion:77}} {{champion:6}} {{champion:254}} {{champion:106}} {{champion:19}} {{champion:5}} {{champion:62}} {{champion:154}} 

Now develop a tier list for your favorite 5 - 7 and then out of those 5 - 7 select your 3 mains, the main goal in the end should be to either climb the ranked ladder, have your own unique playstyle, find your favorite champions to play, or whatever else you have in mind
I'm just gonna assume you don't play jungle and move on

Udyr stomps until Diamond.
And then he gets kited.
Watch this guy - https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCwE00vEJFzpO6j1rDJMLDfg. Gives good insight on jungle and how to play it.
Kayn. He isn’t overpowered. But if at any point you get ahead, it’ll feel like he is.
Blue kayn. Go watch nightblue3. Im serious when saying blue can will one shot anyone not tanky.
